items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Dress was a hit!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I brought this dress to get married in and it was almost perfect, but I still wore it. The spaghetti straps was a bit awkward and uncomfortable for me. It should have been away to adjust the straps. Besides that, I loved the dress. I purchased it in a large. I received several compliments. Read more
items.author: Lashay J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Love this dress! The color was spot on for what I wanted, deep purple. Size was true to size, i had ordered up & needed to take it in to fit me. The material was not scratchy & was comfortable to wear for a long time. It is a heavy dress with all the layers but so beautiful! Read more
items.author: AmyA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Eye-Catching
items.body: such an amazing dress!!! Eye catching and everyone loved how beautiful it wasðŸ¥°ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥° Read more
items.author: Wally

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars 45th Class Reunion - Prom 2.0
items.body: The dress is gorgeous! It made me feel like a princess. It is made in good quality.However, it was not true to size for me. I am short (5â€™0) so it was very long and when I walk it step on it. The only was to get in the dress was to step into it. I was not able to lace it on my own, so I tried to lace it then pull it over my head. That didnâ€™t work. I got stuck and had to wiggle out of it (LOL). The straps do not stay up on me. It said it had free returns but when I tried to return it through UPS they said it had to be mailed and there was no bar code. I paid for postage only for the dress to come back to me because the address was inaccurate. I had trouble sending it back but the buyer finally reached out to me and issue was resolved (as long as they hold up their end of the bargain. I wish I would have did a before picture. Iâ€™m going to have the dress altered and take an after picture. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually so perfect!
items.body: Iâ€™m a sophomore but I got invited to prom this year by a junior so I needed a dress really fast and I didnâ€™t want to spend too much money on it just in case something happened and I ended up not being able to go. This dress is actually amazing! I wanted something kind of simple just so I wouldnâ€™t be too disappointed if I ended up not going to prom but itâ€™s actually so gorgeous. The quality of the dress is great the fabric is thick and came with very in perfect condition. The color doesnâ€™t show up well in my camera but I got the blush color and it shows up really well on the dress. When I ordered it the company sent an email asking for measurements so that they could tailor it for me the people who emailed me were extremely friendly and it came tailored perfectly! Im actually so in love with this dress! Thank you so much! Read more
items.author: Cameron

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Aqua, Fuchsia, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Peacock, Lake Blue, Lavender, Royal Blue, Wisteria, Grey, Sky Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
